title: Messenger
description: Messenger is recognized for its vibrant and dynamic colors, which range from a striking blue (#0A7CFF) to energetic pink (#FF5297) and orange (#FF6C5C). Additionally, the timeless contrast of black (#000000) and the serene off-white (#FBFBFF) adds to its visual appeal. These colors are characteristic of Messenger's identity and can be verified through official resources provided by Facebook's brand toolkit.
